topics.body:
"but i always tell myself, that its gonna get better
you know who you is? YOU THE GREATEST RAPPER EVER
so now it comes the time, to prove that voice right
some people never knew their goals
knew mine my whole life":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J--rO7FP16U

this track is such a fucking banger, it ends XXX in such a perfect, sad and tragic note, pretty much taking the whole message of the album into 1 single track that at first sight seems like another club oriented song.

like goddamn i will shove this song down everyone´s throat till they like it.

ignore the first lines, the rest is top notch.

Take this from a long time drug user, any music you need to chemically alter yourself to appreciate is shitty music. Fuck, I don't even like the Grateful Dead when I'm stoned.

On the other hand Acid Rap is still a good mixtape even without drugs, so I dunno.

Recently I've been smoking it for actual medical reasons (not shitting anyone on this) as my back and knees have been giving me a lot of pain recently.
